body:
Suggest

Check specific variables, pop up error message

current situation

Suppose, there is `$env: ALLUSERSPROFILE` in the script and it will run in linux.  It does not return any errors.
```powershell
get-childitem -path "$($env:ALLUSERSPROFILE)\ffmpeg" -filter 'ffmpeg.exe' -Recurse
```
title: Check for special variables.
